titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Responsible Enterprise Association Educational Foundation records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Responsible Enterprise Association Educational Foundation records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Conservative libertarian organization founded by Royal D. Rood, at one time a chemistry teacher at the St. Matthew Lutheran School in Detroit, Mich. The organization held anti-government views.
archdesc.scopecontent: Addresses by Royal D. Rood, newsletters, bulletins, and pamphlets published by the Association, as well as several pieces of correspondence with St. Matthew Lutheran School.
